course_description:
A course for students interested in becoming familiar with the principles of ballroom and social dance, consisting of terminology and technique. This course will concentrate on the following dances: Foxtrot, Waltz, American Tango, East Coast Swing, Rumba, Cha-cha, Salsa and free-style Hip-Hop.
